hints.content: To subtract on the number line, we start at $71$ and move **left** $\purpleD{30}$ and then $\maroonD{5}$ more.

This number line shows $71 - 35$:

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 41, and 71. From 71 an arrow goes to 41 with the label minus 30 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 41 to question mark with the label minus 5 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1ad8f1ec2b4726c14de13fa1f4d90d06c5908439)
